component_edible.eat_message: You take a bite of that foo.

liquor_bottle.name: bottle
liquor_bottle.desc: You see an empty bottle of liquor. The brand is indeterminate.

component_item.unmoved_examine: You see a bottle of liquor resting on its side, its contents empty.

tan_trenchcoat.name: tan trench coat
tan_trenchcoat.desc: You see your well-worn tan trench coat, made of a heavy cotton.

component_item.unmoved_examine: You see your well-worn tan trench coat hung on a thin wire coat hangar, it barely holding up the weight of the heavy cotton.

red_pen.name: red pen
red_pen.desc: You see a cheap red ballpoint pen.

component_item.unmoved_examine: A red ballpoint pen resting on top of it.

bathroom_sink.name: sink
bathroom_sink.desc: You see a chipped, sad-looking sink mounted to the far wall.

broken_mirror.name: shattered mirror
broken_mirror.desc: You see a frame that presumably held a mirror at one point. Now, though, the frame sits blank with only a few disjointed shards of the reflective glass jutting out of the sides.

reception_desk.name: reception desk
reception_desk.desc: You see a diminuative and brown desk guarding the door to the back room of your office. At one point, you recall, you had a receptionist sitting there.

reception_chair.name: chair
reception_chair.desc: You see a worn-out office chair behind the reception desk. Its black cushioning is worn down in the exact spot where someone would sit.

front_office_chair.name: chair
front_office_chair.desc: You see a cheap chair, its back pressed up against the wall. The seating cushion is a faded tan, with the arms and legs being some kind of black metal.
